title: 820-00840, SSD installed while the battery connected
message:
Hello, 
I have an 820-00840, i believe that the client removed and installed the SSD without disconnecting the battery.
The start to turn on but no image on the screen, if I remove the SSD, everything works fine and I can boot from an external driver, and get into macOS.
I tried a different SSD, but the problem came back with no image on the screen. 
thanks

title: 820-00840, SSD installed while the battery connected
